title: Candy Land
prompt: Create an ultra-realistic 8K Christmas portrait using a 55mm lens with bright, playful holiday lighting, based on the input photo while strictly preserving the subjectsâ€™ real facial features. Style the subjects in festive outfits embellished with shimmering sequins, and have them hold an oversized pink-and-white peppermint lollipop prop resting over her shoulder in a fun, candy-land pose. The scene is set in a fully decorated holiday studio featuring fluffy artificial snow on the ground, frost-dusted Christmas trees adorned with pink ornaments and string lights, oversized candy canes framing the scene, and a large glossy red Christmas ornament near her feet. Lighting should be clean, bright, and celebratory to highlight the sparkle of the sequins and candy-themed props, with a vibrant color palette of reds, whites, and silvers that evokes a magical North Pole holiday atmosphere.
